meanings.definition: The action of stating something again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The restatement of the rule helped everyone understand it better.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer provided a restatement of the evidence for the jury.
meanings.sent3: The restatement of the joke made everyone laugh even harder.
meanings.sent4: Her restatement of the problem shed new light on the issue.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's restatement of the lesson made it crystal clear.

meanings.definition: A revised version of a statement or document.
meanings.sent1: The restatement of the contract included updated terms.
meanings.sent2: The company issued a restatement of their financial report.
meanings.sent3: The restatement of the recipe made it easier to follow.
meanings.sent4: His restatement of the speech added more clarity to the message.
meanings.sent5: The restatement of the policy clarified the new guidelines.
